message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for us to work together. I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1050000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $900000. I'm willing to compromise at $975000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $975000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $1025000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not willing to pay $1025000. I'm willing to meet you at $1000000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1000000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1075000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
I'm getting close to my limit, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $950000. This is my final offer. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

I understand that you're getting close to your limit, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1050000. This is my final offer.
